note.p: Death: St Mary Bourne, Andover, Hampshire (30 March 1944)
Education: Marlborough; Royal School of Mines
Career: Demonstrator of Physics, Normal School of Science and Royal School of Mines.
Obituaries: Obituary Notices of Fellows of the Royal Society 1942-1944 vol 4 pp 771-788, plate, by Rayleigh
References: Sir Kenneth Hutchison, 'The Royal Society and the Foundation of the British Gas Industry' in NR 1984-85 vol 39 pp 245-270, plate
F Kurzer, 'The life and work of Charles Tomlinson FRS: A Career in Victorian Science and Technology' in NR 2004 vol 58 pp 203-226
